description: This file defines the declaration of the L2Tests class within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. It declares the class as a plugin component implementing plugin and JSON-RPC interfaces, including constructor, destructor, and a method for performing L2 tests via JSON-RPC.

classes.name: L2Tests
classes.description: A plugin class implementing IPlugin and JSONRPC interfaces for L2 testing within the WPEFramework, providing initialization, deinitialization, information retrieval, and a JSON-RPC method to perform L2 tests.

methods.name: L2Tests
methods.description: Constructor for the L2Tests plugin class.

methods.name: ~L2Tests
methods.description: Destructor for the L2Tests plugin class.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell service.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up the plugin associated with the provided shell service.

methods.name: string Information() const
methods.description: Returns a string with plugin information.

methods.name: PerformL2Tests
methods.description: Performs Layer 2 tests based on provided JSON parameters and populates the response JSON object.

ctags.name: Information
ctags.pattern: /^        virtual string Information() const override { return {}; }$/

ctags.name: L2Tests
ctags.pattern: /^    class L2Tests : public PluginHost::IPlugin, public PluginHost::JSONRPC { $/
